amendment.description: Amendment prohibits Federal Prison Industries from bidding on contracts that have been reserved for small businesses.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit FPI from bidding on contracts that have been reserved for small businesses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Toomey amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Toomey.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Toomey amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
